results.title: nexss -help
results.result:
List of quick/helper (-) functions
-arg-progress.md - Displays available colors for .nexss files
-bg.md - Starts nexss in the background.
-dev-colors.md - Disable colorized output result
-dev-help.md - shows help for devs like constants, paths tips and tricks
-dev-update.md - Updates code to the branch of the choice.
-dev-validation.md - Displays available validation for use in \_nexss.yml.
-env.md - Displays os, distro name, versions and package managers..
-global-config.md - Displays variables in the global config
-help.md - This help info
-output-colors.md - Displays available colors for .nexss files
-pack.md - Pack selected files and folders eg. nexss -pack myfile1 myfolder2 myfile3 mypack.tar.gz
-version.md - Shows version of the Nexss Programmer.

Programmer 2.4.25, NodeJS v14.16.1, OS: win32 10.0.19042  
nexss cache rebuild|r Rebuild cache (handy also during dev of Nexss Programmer)
nexss command|cmd add|a Add a new command to the project.
nexss command|cmd Execute a command eg. `nexss cmd findUpdatedFiles`.
nexss command|cmd delete|d Deletes defined command from the `_nexss.yml` config file.
nexss command|cmd list|l List of the available commands.
nexss config get|g Prints config settings from the `_nexss.yml`.
nexss config set|s Sets a config data in the config file `_nexss.yml`.
nexss core .gitignore 
nexss edit|e Edit file with common editors.
nexss file|f add|a Adds a new file to the project (with template selection)
nexss file|f delete|rm Deletes files from the nexss programmer project.
nexss file|f list|l List of the files in the nexss programmer project/package.
nexss language|l format1 Creates a folder with logos and json file with all the languages.
nexss language|l list|l List of the installed languages.
nexss language|l status|s Get changes not staged, untracked files on all languages. (For Developers)
nexss language|l update|u Updates the installed languages to the latest version.
nexss os|o install|i Run installer for particular OS.
nexss package|pkg add|a Adds nexss package to the actual folder.
nexss package|pkg init All installed packages have 'init' command run: `nexss cmd init`
nexss package|pkg install Install packages
nexss package|pkg list|l Lists/search for available packages installed globally.
nexss package|pkg pack Packs the packages as dist.
nexss package|pkg update|u Updates all packages from the repositories.
nexss process|ps clean|c Clean all stopped processes eg. `nexss ps clean`
nexss process|ps find|f Find process by port, pid or name.
nexss process|ps Displays processes.
nexss process|ps stop|s Stop process
nexss project|p attach|a Attach a project (and adds to the global list)
nexss project|p info|i Info about project with statistics eg nexss p info
nexss project|p new|n Adds a new project
nexss project|p remove|rm Remove a project from the central base of projects.
nexss project|p rename|ren Rename a project (field name in the `_nexss.yml` file)
nexss project|p search|s Search through attached projects.
nexss start|s Starts a whole project. The same as `nexss .` or `nexss Path/FolderName`
To display help add 'help': nexss command help OR nexss package help
results.testBody: nexss help shouldContain -> /To display help add 'help': nexss command help OR nexss package help/

results.title: Help per core package
results.result:
# Add

Adds a new file to the project (with template selection)

## Examples

    nexss file add my.pl
    nexss f add my.php
    nexss f a myfile.java --noconfig # it will create file but not add to the config
    nexss file add myfile1.js -f -t=helloWorld # will choice the helloWorld Template. -f for overwrite existing file (be careful)

Each language has own separate templates. If you wrote extension .pl - then Perl templates will be displayed, other extension, other language's templates.
results.testBody: nexss file add help shouldContain -> /Adds a new file to the project \(with template selection\)/

results.title: Help per core
results.result:
# Nexss Package

Manage packages for Nexss Programmer

## Modify global Nexss PROGRAMMER packages

    nexss pkg add Blender --saveNexss # You can modify code from now in your folder and use it for your project.
    nexss pkg init
    nexss pkg init Id # Run command init on the Id (installs package)
    nexss pkg install Id # installs package (Id cannot exists in the NEXSS_PACKAGES_PATH)
    nexss pkg install all # installs all packages

## Examples

    nexss pkg add Mouse/Move --x=10 --y=200
    nexss pkg add Local/Folder
    nexss pkg add Keyboard --type="#d" --copyPackage --saveNexss  --forceNexss # --copyPackage to the current folder (you can modify)
    

Commands available for nexss-package

add, init, install, list, pack, update
example to display help 'nexss package add help'
results.testBody: nexss package help shouldContain -> /Modify global Nexss PROGRAMMER packages/

results.title: Help per package
results.result:
# Id - Nexss PROGRAMMER 2.x

Generates unique id

## Example

    nexss Id # will store new id in the nxsOut field
    nexss Id --nxsAs=myfield # will store the id in the myfield
results.testBody: nexss Id help shouldContain -> /Generates unique id/
